text:
Looks like Bhai is in trouble again. Of course, this isn’t his first brush with the law. However, this one isn’t as grave and complicated as the other times.
Twitter
So, recently Salman Khan was spotted on the roads of Mumbai on his bicycle. No points for guessing that the fans apparently went berserk. Salman Khan reportedly lost his cool, misbehaved with a fan, and snatched away his mobile phone.
And now, a police complaint has been lodged against the star who is behind the Being Human initiative. In the complaint filed against DN Nagar Police Station of Mumbai, the complainant has accused Salman Khan of snatching his phone while he was trying to record his video. According to complainant, he took Salman Khan’s bodyguard’s permission before doing so.
But this isn’t all.

Salman Khan's bodyguard has submitted a cross complaint stating that the person was following the actor and was trying to shoot the video without his consent.
On the other hand, complainant has accused Salman Khan and his bodyguards of misbehaving with him.
